item.title: Towards Efficient and Optimal Covariance-Adaptive Algorithms for Combinatorial Semi-Bandits
item.description: Novel covariance-adaptive algorithms achieve optimal gap-free regret bounds for combinatorial semi-bandits, improving efficiency with sampling-based approaches.
